text: The Democrats in Washington are desperately hoping you won't notice, but their radical policies have led to the highest gas prices in American history. https://t.co/DWihwdVzLK

The nationwide average price for a gallon of gas has reached $4.72—the highest price ever recorded. Democrats simply don’t have a strategy to address our energy crisis—but Republicans do. https://t.co/GEFY8c10Qh

The AG shouldn't classify parents as terrorists.
The IRS shouldn't be weaponized against Americans.
The origins of COVID shouldn't be brushed under the rug.

The American people deserve accountability from the Biden administration. A Republican majority will make it happen.

Economics 101: As supply goes down, price goes up. 

So why did Biden restrict the supply of American-made energy on Day One of his presidency? Radical policies from Democrats are driving up the price you pay at the pump because they think you should just go buy an electric car. https://t.co/zfEFaYpzT0
